channel.title: Convince on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Convince on Rusland 1

item.title: Convince – Religion
item.description: Terror Strong words about (and mostly against) religion. It is террор (terror), and зло (evil). Also the кнут (knout, whip) that drives you into the pen (что отправит в загон). You will pray (ты будешь молиться) but will not be saved (не будешь спасён).
